page.title: 10THE EAST COKER SOCIETY
page.content:
In 1975 the{East Coker Society}was founded.At the first meeting it was decided that{protection and welfare}of the village would be looked after; i.e.preserving buildings and keeping footpaths open.{Meetings}take place about 4 times a year and a{newsletter is delivered free about 4 times a year to all the 800 houses in the village. Residence in the village confers {membership automatically,}there is no membership fee.
The society has given rise to many other societies in the area which support it with{donations.
As its current project the society plans to produce a{village postcard and is raising funds for this. Photographs submitted by villagers will be used.
